GSD.product_version: versions from v4.0 to before v5.10.90
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_fs: Clear ffs_eventfd in ffs_data_clear.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.90 by commit 1c4ace3e6b8575745c50dca9e76e0021e697d645, it was introduced in version v4.0 by commit 5e33f6fdf735cda1d4580fe6f1878da05718fe73. For more details please see the references link.
